sentences.en: A legislative body unquestionably fashions new law.
sentences.cn: 立法机关所制定的无疑是新的法律.

sentences.en: A third rationale is that rulemaking characteristically turns on " legislative facts " as opposed to " adjudicative facts. "
sentences.cn: ]第三种理论认为规则制定有特色地依靠 " 立法事实 " 而面对"判决事实 ".

sentences.en: A valid legislative rule conclusively settles the matters it addresses, at least at the administrative level.
sentences.cn: 有效的立法规则结论性地解决它所论及的事宜, 至少在行政一级如此.

sentences.en: Courts have frequently used extrinsic aids to establish legislative intension.
sentences.cn: 法院往往借助外部帮助以研究立法意图.

sentences.en: Even his dissents were widely quoted, and some prompted legislative changes.
sentences.cn: 甚至他那些异议也被广泛引用, 而且有的还促成了法律上的修改.

sentences.en: Most agencies operate under statutory schemes that permit them to issue legislative rules.
sentences.cn: 多数行政机关根据准许它们发布立法规则的法定方案运作.

sentences.en: new legislative measures to stem the flow of drugs into the US
sentences.cn: 遏制毒品流入美国的新的立法措施

sentences.en: Rigid insistence on the legislative specification of detailed standards is thought to be unsound and unworkable.
sentences.cn: 僵硬地坚持对详尽的标准要有立法说明,这一主张被认为是不合理和不切实际的.

sentences.en: Similarly, the Republic's legislative practices came from the parent land.
sentences.cn: 同样, 共和国的分歧程序也仿效母国.

sentences.en: Taxation is no part of the governing or legislative power.
sentences.cn: 征税权不是统治权与立法权的一部分.

sentences.en: The assembly had been shorn of its legislative powers.
The discussion thus far has concerned delegation of legislative power.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,以上的讨论都涉及立法权的授予.

sentences.en: The legislative body had voted to oust the country's onetime rulers.
sentences.cn: 立法机构通过投票将该国的前度领导人赶下了台。

sentences.en: The new assemblies will have no legislative power.
sentences.cn: 新的议会将没有立法权。

sentences.en: The solution they favored was increased reliance on an old device: the so - called " legislative veto. "
sentences.cn: 他们赞成的解决办法是不断依靠一种老式的手段: 所谓的 “ 立法否决 ”.

sentences.en: They argue that the commission should risk courting unpopularity and push on with its legislative programmes.
sentences.cn: 他们认为委员会应该甘冒不受欢迎的风险来推进其立法项目。

phrases.tran_cn: 立法委员会（英国议会上院）

trans.tran_cn: （关于）立法的，立法决定的，有权立法的，用以立法的，立法机构的
